  • 方法详细资料

    • equals

      public static boolean equals(byte[] b1, int offset1, byte[] b2, int offset2, int length)
      Compare sections of two byte arrays for equality.
      参数:
      b1 - byte array 1
      offset1 - offset for comparison in byte array 1
      b2 - byte array 2
      offset2 - offset for comparison in byte array 2
      length - the length of the byte arrays to compare
      返回:
      true if the array segments are equal; false otherwise

    • createFileChannelForWriting

      public static FileChannel createFileChannelForWriting(File file) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • createNewFile

      public static void createNewFile(File file) throws IOException
      Creates a new file including deleting an already existing file with the same path and name and creating any needed directories.
      参数:
      file - the file to create
      抛出:
      IOException

    • createOutputStream

      public static OutputStream createOutputStream(File file) throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • dumpLongAsString

      public static String dumpLongAsString(int i)
      Converts an integer into a 4 character string using the ASCII encoding.
      参数:
      i - the value to convert
      返回:
      the String based on the number

    • checkSum

      public static long checkSum(byte[] b, int offset, int length)
      Calculate an OpenType checksum from the array.
      参数:
      b - the array to calculate checksum on
      offset - the starting index in the array
      length - the number of bytes to check; must be a multiple of 4
      返回:
      checksum

    • encodeOneChar

      public static int encodeOneChar(CharsetEncoder encoder, int uchar)
      Encode a single character in UTF-16.
      参数:
      encoder - the encoder to use for the encoding
      uchar - the Unicode character to encode
      返回:
      the encoded character

    • getEncoder

      public static CharsetEncoder getEncoder(String charsetName)
      Get an encoder for the charset name. If the name is null or the empty string then just return null.
      参数:
      charsetName - the charset to get an encoder for
      返回:
      an encoder or null if no encoder available for charset name

    • extension

      public static String extension(File file)

    • readFile

      public static byte[] readFile(File file) throws IOException
      Read a file fully into a new byte array.
      参数:
      file - the file to read
      返回:
      the byte array
      抛出:
      IOException

    • equals

      public static boolean equals(int offset1, ReadableFontData rfd1, int offset2, ReadableFontData rfd2, int length)
      参数:
      offset1 - offset to start comparing the first ReadableFontData from
      rfd1 - the first ReadableFontData
      offset2 - offset to start comparing the second ReadableFontData from
      rfd2 - the second ReadableFontData
      length - the number of bytes to compare
      返回:
      true if all bytes in the ranges given are equal; false otherwise

    • equalsNullOk

      public static boolean equalsNullOk(Object o1, Object o2)
      Checks that both objects are equal as defined by the object itself. If one is null then they are not equal. If both are null they are considered equal.
      参数:
      o1 - first object
      o2 - second object
      返回:
      true if equal
